module_info.title: LLM Application Foundations
module_info.subtitle: From Scripts to Professional Applications
module_info.description: Transform individual scripts into professional, modular AI applications using industry best practices for code organization, error handling, and user interface design.
prerequisites: Basic Python syntax (variables, functions, loops, conditionals)
Simple API calls with requests library
learning_outcomes: Analyze and refactor monolithic scripts into modular applications
Apply object-oriented programming principles to AI application development
Implement robust error handling and user feedback systems
Create both command-line and web interfaces for AI applications
Evaluate and improve code quality using professional development standards

video_scripts.format: Teleprompter-ready with visual cues and accessibility notes

scripts.title: Module Overview: From Scripts to Applications
scripts.learning_focus: Course motivation and learning journey preview

scripts.title: Code Organization Principles
scripts.learning_focus: Separation of concerns and modular design

scripts.title: Object-Oriented Programming for AI
scripts.learning_focus: Classes, encapsulation, and AI application architecture

scripts.title: Error Handling and Robustness
scripts.learning_focus: Production-grade error management and user experience

scripts.title: Web Interfaces with Gradio
scripts.learning_focus: User-friendly web interface creation and UX design

scripts.title: Testing and Quality Assurance
scripts.learning_focus: Testing strategies and code quality principles

labs.title: Script to Application Transformation
learning_objectives: Analyze problems in monolithic script organization

labs.title: Command-Line Interface Development
learning_objectives: Implement argument parsing and help documentation
Apply user experience principles to command-line tools
Handle errors gracefully in CLI context

labs.title: Web Interface Creation with Gradio
learning_objectives: Design intuitive web interfaces for AI applications
Create responsive and accessible web designs
Deploy web applications for public access

programming_assignment.title: Personal AI Assistant Application
programming_assignment.description: Comprehensive AI application demonstrating all Module 1 concepts with both CLI and web interfaces
requirements: Modular application architecture with clear separation of concerns
Object-oriented design with appropriate use of classes
Robust error handling throughout the application
Both command-line and web interface implementations
programming_assignment.portfolio_value: Professional-quality project suitable for job applications

success_predictors: Quality of code organization in assignments

review_process.industry_review: Professional AI developers and hiring managers

Robust error handling and user experience design
Code quality evaluation and professional development practices

Command-line interface demonstrating professional CLI development

Personal AI Assistant showcasing all module concepts
